name: Lunar Mirror:The Pavilion of Desire
description:
• This is a mysterious party, all party members will wear a mask, losing the mask will also mean that you will lose everything
  • What secret is hidden on the second floor of this party, where is the missing girlfriend imprisoned
  • Is this a party or a selection? Where is the mysterious party organizer hidden?




"Lunar Mirror: The Pavilion of Desire" is a derivative work of "Lunar Mirror". It tells the story of an ordinary college student who was abandoned by his girlfriend in a remote archaeological school and joined a mysterious party at the school. The story of different girls who were finally lured into the abyss. There are also a large number of mini-games in the game for players to experience.
You thought that you would be like the protagonist, who would retreat after discovering all the secrets, but you are actually just an ordinary passerby, and you will only walk towards the trap that has been prepared for you step by step with hope...




The game takes place in the world view of Mirror of the Moon. Players will enter the Hall of Desire from the perspective of an ordinary student, and finally sink into it, discovering the secret behind this campus..
